chinese: 和其他数百万人一样
english: Like millions of others

chinese: 我听说齐马宣布将要公开自己的最后一件作品
english: I'd heard Zima announce the unveiling of his final work of art

chinese: 这些年 我多次申请采访他
english: Over the years I'd asked many times for interviews

chinese: 但是每次都遭到了拒绝
english: and was always rejected

chinese: 现在 不知是什么原因
english: Now for whatever reason

chinese: 齐马·蓝要求和我谈谈
english: Zima Blue had requested to speak with me

chinese: 我无法确定这个蓝色
english: I couldn't decide whether the blue

chinese: 是更接近天空 还是海洋的颜色
english: was a closer match to the sky or to the sea

chinese: 其实都不是
english: Neither really

chinese: 齐马蓝 是一个很精确的颜色
english: Zima Blue it was a precise thing

chinese: 人们对齐马的过去知之甚少
english: Little is known about Zima's history

chinese: 据说他的艺术事业是从肖像画开始的
english: It was said that he started his art career in portraiture

chinese: 但对于齐马来说 人类形态这个主题太过渺小
english: but for Zima the human form was too small a subject

chinese: 追寻更深入的真相 促使他走向更深处
english: The search for deeper meaning caused him to look further

chinese: 走向宇宙本身
english: to the cosmos itself

chinese: 他的壁画事业就是这么开始的
english: That's how the mural work started

chinese: 那些作品毫无疑问显示出他的才华横溢
english: They were undeniably brilliant

chinese: 有天 齐马公开了一幅有些与众不同的壁画
english: One day Zima unveiled a mural that had something different about it

chinese: 在画布中心 是一个小小的蓝色方块
english: In the middle of the canvas was a tiny blue square

chinese: 那个方块只是一切的开始
english: The square was just the beginning

chinese: 在接下来几十年里
english: Over the next several decades

chinese: 那个抽象的形状开始改变 并变得越来越明显
english: the abstract shapes changed and became more dominant

chinese: 但是一直以来 那抹蓝色从未改变
english: But always the shade of blue was the same

chinese: 那就是齐马蓝
english: It was Zima Blue

chinese: 很久以前 齐马
english: Before very long

chinese: 公开了他第一幅纯蓝色的壁画
english: unveiled the first of his entirely blue murals

chinese: 很多人认为这是齐马能力的极限了
english: It was considered by many to be as far as Zima could take things

chinese: 他们大错特错
english: They couldn't have been more wrong

chinese: 当大多人提到他的蓝色时期时
english: When most people speak about his Blue Period

chinese: 他们指的是那些巨大的壁画...
english: they mean the era of the truly huge murals

chinese: 但齐马才刚刚开始
english: but Zima was just getting started

chinese: 是某种程度的奇观 让齐马真正成名
english: It was a certain level of spectacle that made Zima truly famous

chinese: 即使是那些对艺术不感兴趣的人也知道他
english: even to those with no interest in art

chinese: 但是名气不是他的目的
english: But fame was never the point

chinese: 尽管他已经声名鹊起 齐马仍然不满足
english: In spite of all his success Zima was still dissatisfied

chinese: 他接下来所做的事情 对很多人来说
english: and what he did next was for many

chinese: 太过偏激 不仅仅是为艺术奉献那么简单了
english: too extreme a sacrifice to make for art

chinese: 很高兴你来了 克莱儿
english: Glad you could make it

chinese: 飞行旅程怎么样
english: How was the flight

chinese: 放松 克莱儿
english: Relax

chinese: 嗨
english: Hi

chinese: 有些人认为我很可怕 但他们很快就不畏惧我了
english: Some people find me intimidating but they quickly get over it

chinese: 距离我上次和媒体交流 已经有一百多年了
english: It's been over 100 years since I've spoken to the press

chinese: 我邀请你来 是因为
english: I've invited you here

chinese: 我想让你帮我讲述我的故事
english: I want you to help me tell my story

chinese: 我们来四处走走吧
english: Shall we take a little walk

chinese: 他是个很帅气的男人 即使他进行了那些改造
english: He was a handsome man even after all his transformations

chinese: 有一个星球叫做哈尔科夫八号
english: There was a planet called Eight

chinese: 那里专攻一种非法的机能修改技术
english: It specialized in illicit cybernetic modifications

chinese: 他进行了激进的生物改造
english: He underwent radical biological procedures

chinese: 让他能够承受极端环境
english: that enabled him to tolerate extreme environments

chinese: 却不需要任何保护服
english: without the burden of a protective suit

chinese: 他的眼睛能够看到所有频谱
english: His eyes could see in any known spectrum

chinese: 他不再呼吸氧气
english: He no longer breathed oxygen

chinese: 他的皮肤被压力聚合物所代替
english: His skin was replaced with pressurized polymer

chinese: 所以他前去探险 与宇宙交流
english: and so he ventured forth to commune with the cosmos

chinese: 但齐马最终意识到
english: But what Zima eventually realized

chinese: 宇宙早已用他无法企及的方式
english: is that the cosmos was already speaking its own truth

chinese: 说出了真相
english: far better than he ever could

chinese: 我对真相的搜索让我来到了这里
english: My search for truth has led me here

chinese: 也是我最终的终点
english: to what will be my final piece

chinese: 终于 我理解自己通过艺术所寻找的东西了
english: At last I understand the thing I sought through my art

chinese: 那和这个游泳池有什么关系吗
english: And what does this swimming pool have to do with that

chinese: 这不仅仅是一个游泳池
english: It's not just any swimming pool

chinese: 很久以前 它属于一个富有天赋的年轻女性
english: Long ago it belonged to a talented young woman

chinese: 她对实用型机器人有着执着的兴趣
english: with a keen interest in practical robotics

chinese: 她创造了几十个机器人在家中进行各种工作
english: She created dozens of robots to do odd jobs around her house

chinese: 但她最喜爱的一个机器人
english: but she was especially fond of

chinese: 是为她清扫游泳池的那一个
english: the one she'd created to clean her swimming pool

chinese: 那个小机器人没完没了地辛苦工作
english: The little machine toiled endlessly

chinese: 清扫着泳池的每一个角落
english: scrubbing the ceramic sides of the pool

chinese: 但是年轻女孩对它的工作仍不满意
english: But the young woman wasn't satisfied with the job it did

chinese: 所以她给予了它有色的视觉系统
english: So she gave it a full color vision system

chinese: 以及足够将分析的视觉数据
english: and a brain large enough to process the visual data

chinese: 转换成周围的环境模板的大脑
english: into a model of its surroundings

chinese: 她给予了它自主决定的能力
english: She gave it the ability to make its own decisions

chinese: 来设计清理泳池的不同方案
english: to design different strategies for cleaning the pool

chinese: 她继续把那个机器
english: She continued to use the machine

chinese: 作为新硬件以及软件的测试品
english: as a test-bed for new hardware and software

chinese: 渐渐地 它变得越来越有意识
english: And by stages it became more aware

chinese: 最后 那个女人死了
english: Eventually the woman died

chinese: 那个小机器人
english: The little machine was passed

chinese: 被传给了一个又一个主人
english: from one owner to the next

chinese: 它被添加了许多功能 不断地被改良
english: They added things made modifications here and there

chinese: 每次迭代 它都变得越来越清醒
english: and with every iteration it became more alive

chinese: 变得更加...
english: Became more

chinese: 像我
english: me

chinese: 这是同一个泳池
english: This is that same pool

chinese: 我把它挖了起来 搬到了这里
english: I had it dug up Moved here

chinese: 但你是一个机器零件组成的人类啊
english: But you're a man with machine parts

chinese: 不是认为自己是人类的机器人
english: not a machine that thinks it's a man

chinese: 有时 我也很难理解自己成为了什么
english: Sometimes it's difficult even for me to understand what I've become

chinese: 更加难以记起我曾经是什么
english: And harder still to remember what I once was

chinese: 那个蓝色的方块...
english: The blue of the tiles

chinese: 齐马蓝 厂商是这么叫它的
english: Zima Blue the manufacturer called it

chinese: 是我看见的第一个东西
english: The first thing I ever saw

chinese: 这是我开始的地方
english: This was where I began

chinese: 一个粗糙的
english: A crude little machine with

chinese: 不够智能 无法自控的小机器人
english: barely enough intelligence to steer itself

chinese: 但那曾是我的世界
english: But it was my world

chinese: 那是我知道的一切 我只需知道的一切
english: It was all I knew all I needed to know

chinese: 那现在呢
english: And now

chinese: 我会全身心投入
english: I will immerse myself

chinese: 这么做的同时 我会慢慢关闭我的高级大脑功能
english: And as I do I will slowly shut down my higher brain functions

chinese: 毁掉我自己...
english: un-making myself

chinese: 只留下一小部分让我享受周围的环境...
english: leaving just enough to appreciate my surroundings

chinese: 来感受完成那简单的任务所带来的快乐
english: to extract some simple pleasure from the execution of a task well done

chinese: 我对真相的搜索终于结束了
english: My search for truth is finished at last

chinese: 我要回家了
english: I am going home
